name: Songs of the Void (Demo)
description:
This is a very old demo that I made in the very old version of 001 Game Creator, and the source code has not been preserved. However, this is for the best - this is not the best engine for platformers. If you have an old hardware, you will experience problems with collisions. There is still a couple of bugs that I, unfortunately, can’t fix, but nothing critical - the demo is passable to the end. Recently found, and decided to upload. Why not? I like the atmosphere.

The game is a metroidvania, where you run, jump and shoot. There are a couple of bosses and puzzles. You are a sandrunner, in the post-apocalyptic future, who is supposed to deliver a letter (ideally, but the plot will never reach this point).

Attention! Rude words are present! One actually)
